description: Details of the custom field options for a context.

id.description: The ID of the custom field option.

value.description: The value of the custom field option.

optionId.description: For cascading options, the ID of the custom field option containing the cascading option.

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field to which the option belongs.

contextId.description: The ID of the context to which the custom field option belongs.
